document: AN EXPERIMENTAL INVESTIGATION OF OIL SPREADING OVER WATER by Walter Suchon Submitted in Partial Fulfillment of the Requirements for the Degrees of Bachelor of Science and Master of Science at the MASSACHUSETTS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY April, 1970 Signature of Author Department of Mechanical Engineering Certified by Thesis Supervisor Accepted by Chairman, Departmental Committee on Graduate Students Archives MASS INST. TECH. SEP 10 1970 LIBRARIES
